name: Grandpa Wars
description:
Be a goofy grandpa on a skateboard with 7 different weapons to use and fight your friends,
Kill them and the game roasts them for you-

----IMPORTANT----

TO JOIN YOUR FRIENDS: Make sure you are logged into steam before you open up the game.
if you and your friends are playing from different regions then make sure that the steam download region is the same so you can find the server. IF YOU DO NOT SET THE DOWNLOAD REGION TO SAME THEN YOU CANNOT PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS.
the game allows 4 people to join a match, make sure the person with the best wifi hosts the match.
If you get kicked out of a match or are thrown back into the menu please restart the game to join into a server again.
if it shows the message"Failed" when you try and host a match then restart the game and try again.

---HOW TO PLAY---
Use "SPACE" to fire or use any weapon.

Use "1","2","3",...."7" To switch between different weapons

Use WASD to move.

To exit simply use alt+f4.

Information of what each weapon does is given in the "overview" when you start the game. it is recommended to read to actually use the weapons to their full capabilities.

 the volume cannot be lowered down from within the game so use your device's soundmixer to lower down the volume of the window

Lastly have fun and feel free to support :)

I have more stuff coming out soon!
